Description_lang: Brandish the Conqueror's Banner, granting $s1 Mastery and $s2% increased movement speed to you and your $325862s6 nearest allies, and preventing movement speed from being reduced below $s3%. Lasts $d.|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $<rage> Rage per sec.|r
